name: Grow Big Shrink Small Rock by Joseph Horak
name_original: Grow Big Shrink Small Rock by Joseph Horak
description:
Roll a Rock!

Shrink and Grow!

Bounce off Pads!

Collect 5 Coins!

Controls:

Arrow Keys for Movement

Left Shift to Grow

Left Control to Shrink

Background:

This is a tiny game I made to experiment with 3D and physics in Unity, it is in no way polished or supposed to be a complete game, just a short level to showcase a few concepts.

Game made in Unity

Music made in SonicPi

Sound Effects made in Bfxr

All non-primitive shape assets were downloaded from the Unity Asset Store
